scenes.description: Shiori wraps up her 3D showcase, thanking the audience for their support and sharing some of the humorous things she's learned from them before introducing her final song.
Shiori performs her final song of the showcase, 'Hoshi wo Wataru Tori', in a beautiful nighttime castle garden setting.
scenes.song_name: Hoshi wo Wataru Tori (星を渡る鳥)

subtitles.original: And kaput.
subtitles.english: And kaput.

subtitles.original:
Thanks to you, I now know to throw away
moldy bread and moldy food.
subtitles.english:
Thanks to you, I now know to throw away
moldy bread and moldy food.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: I now know that there's soft cheese...
subtitles.english: I now know that there's soft cheese...

subtitles.original: ...and hard cheese...
subtitles.english: ...and hard cheese...

subtitles.original: ...and other types of cheese...
subtitles.english: ...and other types of cheese...

subtitles.original: ...and I just really like to point...
subtitles.english: ...and I just really like to point...

subtitles.original: ...'cause I'm cheesy.
subtitles.english: ...'cause I'm cheesy.

subtitles.original: But yeah, thank you for watching me...
subtitles.english: But yeah, thank you for watching me...

subtitles.original: ...and supporting me and keeping me company.
subtitles.english: ...and supporting me and keeping me company.

subtitles.original: Sorry, I've been yelling a lot.
subtitles.english: Sorry, I've been yelling a lot.

subtitles.original: It feels surreal to be here.
subtitles.english: It feels surreal to be here.

subtitles.original: そして...皆さん、全部、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: And... everyone, thank you for everything.

subtitles.original: 皆さんはとてもかっこいいです。
subtitles.english: You are all very cool.

subtitles.original: 一番です！
subtitles.english: You're the best!

subtitles.original: But, you know...
subtitles.english: But, you know...

subtitles.original: I have one more song for you guys.
subtitles.english: I have one more song for you guys.

subtitles.original: That's right, the number one.
subtitles.english: That's right, the number one.

subtitles.original: So, if you don't mind taking a few more minutes...
subtitles.english: So, if you don't mind taking a few more minutes...

subtitles.original: ...to listen to my voice...
subtitles.english: ...to listen to my voice...

subtitles.original: ...私の声です。
subtitles.english: ...it is my voice.

subtitles.original: Please, please listen.
subtitles.english: Please, please listen.

subtitles.original: Or not, I don't know. Okay.
subtitles.english: Or not, I don't know. Okay.

subtitles.original: Give me a few seconds, I'm tired.
subtitles.english: Give me a few seconds, I'm tired.

subtitles.original: Okay, here I go.
subtitles.english: Okay, here I go.

subtitles.original:
星を渡る鳥
Lyrics • Music : Nem
subtitles.english:
The Bird That Crosses the Stars
Lyrics • Music : Nem

subtitles.original: この空の果てに
subtitles.english: At the end of this sky...

subtitles.original: 昔々こことよく似た
subtitles.english: Long, long ago, much like this one,

subtitles.original: 命に溢れる星があったという
subtitles.english: They say there was a star overflowing with life.

subtitles.original: 人は欲望に溺れやがて
subtitles.english: People drowned in their desires, and eventually...

subtitles.original: 世界は息をするのをやめた
subtitles.english: ...the world stopped breathing.

subtitles.original: 長い、長い時が流れ
subtitles.english: A long, long time passed...

subtitles.original: 聞こえたのはあなたが あなたが
subtitles.english: ...and what I heard was you, was you,

subtitles.original: 私を呼ぶ声
subtitles.english: ...calling my name.

subtitles.original: 私は鳥になり 遠く、遠く 羽ばたいて行く
subtitles.english: I will become a bird and flap my wings far, far away.

subtitles.original: 幾千の星を越え あなたの元へ
subtitles.english: Crossing thousands of stars to where you are.

subtitles.original: 体は燃え尽き 灰になって 消えて行っても
subtitles.english: Even if my body burns out, turns to ash and disappears,

subtitles.original: 心は時を越え 約束の場所へ飛ぶ
subtitles.english: My heart will transcend time and fly to the promised place.

subtitles.original: 自分の姿も思い出せず
subtitles.english: Unable to even remember my own form,

subtitles.original: 微かな自我は誰にも見えず
subtitles.english: My faint sense of self invisible to anyone.

subtitles.original: 永い、永い時が流れ
subtitles.english: A long, long time passed...

subtitles.original: たどり着いた あなたが あなたが
subtitles.english: ...and I arrived at the star where you, where you...

subtitles.original: 待ち続けた星
subtitles.english: ...kept waiting.

subtitles.original: 君と僕が生まれた地球
subtitles.english: The place where you and I were born,

subtitles.original: ここに同じ名前を付けよう
subtitles.english: Let's give it the same name here.

subtitles.original: 二人の心は一つになり光になった
subtitles.english: Our hearts became one and turned into light,

subtitles.original: 全ての命がまた生まれるように
subtitles.english: So that all life may be born again.

subtitles.original: 同じ過ちをもう二度とは犯さないよう
subtitles.english: So that the same mistakes are never made again,

subtitles.original: 私は愛の歌 ここで歌い続ける
subtitles.english: I will continue to sing a song of love here.
